name: Hypnagogia: Boundless Dreams
storyline:
Gogi, the dream protector, has been kidnapped by a malevolent force. In his absence the ethereal Dream Crystal has fractured... its shards spread throughout the world. As a shell of its former self, the world slowly begins warping into a twisted land of nightmares. An overbearing evil begins to rapidly manifest, and reclaiming the lost pieces of the crystal is the only way to return things back to normal.

There may be others seeking to consume its power for themselves however... how will events unfold as you descend deeper into the changing dreamscape?
summary: Meet colorful characters, discover mysterious secrets, and reassemble the fractured remains of an ethereal crystal as you explore a series of abstract worlds based on dreams, nightmares, and the places in between.
